argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_dvdsnegb | |- ( ( M e. ZZ /\ N e. ZZ ) -> ( M || N <-> M || -u N ) ) |
| 2 |  | #P_znegcl | |- ( N e. ZZ -> -u N e. ZZ ) |
| 3 |  | #P_dvdsadd | |- ( ( M e. ZZ /\ -u N e. ZZ ) -> ( M || -u N <-> M || ( M + -u N ) ) ) |
| 4 | 2, 3 | #P_sylan2 | |- ( ( M e. ZZ /\ N e. ZZ ) -> ( M || -u N <-> M || ( M + -u N ) ) ) |
| 5 |  | #P_zcn | |- ( M e. ZZ -> M e. CC ) |
| 6 |  | #P_zcn | |- ( N e. ZZ -> N e. CC ) |
| 7 |  | #P_negsub | |- ( ( M e. CC /\ N e. CC ) -> ( M + -u N ) = ( M - N ) ) |
| 8 | 5, 6, 7 | #P_syl2an | |- ( ( M e. ZZ /\ N e. ZZ ) -> ( M + -u N ) = ( M - N ) ) |
| 9 | 8 | #P_breq2d | |- ( ( M e. ZZ /\ N e. ZZ ) -> ( M || ( M + -u N ) <-> M || ( M - N ) ) ) |
| 10 | 1, 4, 9 | #P_3bitrd | |- ( ( M e. ZZ /\ N e. ZZ ) -> ( M || N <-> M || ( M - N ) ) ) |
